Race.SpecificTitle: Lawtell Gravity Drain. Dist. #11 -- 5.08 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Lawtell Gravity Drainage District No. 11 Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5.08 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Lawtell Gravity Drainage District No. 11 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of five and eight hundredths (5.08) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $58,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage Dist. #14 -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 14 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 5 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall St. Landry Gravity Drainage District No. 14 of St. Landry Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $47,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of constructing, improving, and maintaining gravity drainage works within and for the District?
